title: Scp 8642 15
content:
You make the mistake of asking why this department needs 8 Scranton Reality Anchors.

“Why do you need to know?” Hannah’s voice makes you almost jump out of your skin; you have no idea how she suddenly got behind you. She glares at you, looking far more imposing than she did before. “We deal with anomalies,” she says coldly. “The Reality Anchors are to make sure nothing happens if we encounter a reality-warping anomaly.”

You glance nervously around the room; all eyes are on you, all other sounds in the room have ceased, and you are thoroughly creeped out. You don’t even see a place where 8 Scranton Reality Anchors would fit in this room. Then your eyes fall on the mysterious double doors in the back of the room, and you realize that the Reality Anchors, and whatever they are being used for, must be behind them. You could push your luck and insist on asking about the Reality Anchors and the mysterious double doors, but that might lead to a dangerous situation. You still have the option to take the data you’ve been given and leave without trouble. Gathering yourself, you decide to…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/14 Leave with the information you have.]||= 15||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/19 Insist on getting information about the Reality Anchors.]||
